Root.AlarmStripesMethod:
dim str dim arr dim i
str = pMe.Item(Group).Value
arr = Pm.StringSplit (str, ";", "empty:1;")
if Alarm and ALack then arr(Display-1) = "2" elseif Alarm and not ALack then arr(Display-1) = "1" elseif not Alarm and ALack then arr(Display-1) = "3" else arr(Display-1) = "0" end if
str = ""
for i = 0 to ubound(arr) str = str & arr(i) & ";" next
pMe.Item(Group).Value = str
